channel.title: babashka on Staying up later than I should

item.title: Babashka is a great Clojure entry point
item.description: There are a lot of great ways to get started with Clojure. The community around Clojure and the love they feel for the language has driven numerous resources, books, websites, and tutorials aimed at helping newcomers get started. One easy way to take Clojure for a test-drive is Babashka . Approaching Clojure for the first time Everyone learns differently. My first experience with Clojure was following a tutorial that used Leiningen to produce a “hello world!
